quote: You can have it all. You just can't have it all at once.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: If you truly expect something to be difficult, it will be.
author: Peter A. Cohen

quote: You are now, and you do become, what you think about.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Remember, hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things.
author: Stephen King
